templateOverviewScreen.description:
Create and edit templates for Microsoft 365 (Teams, Email, Meetings).
Active templates may then be selected and used to prefill the corresponding fields.
templateOverviewScreen.missingPermission: You don't have the permissions to view this site.

templateTab.deleteSuccessMessage: The template has been deleted successfully.
templateTab.deleteTemplateWarning: This will delete the template permanently. Are you sure you want to delete this template?
templateTab.creator: Creator
templateTab.defaultTemplateTooltip: If a default template is configured, it will be loaded automatically without the user having to select it manually. The user will still be able to select a different template afterwards.
templateTab.defaultEmailReplyTooltip: If a default reply template is configured, it will be loaded automatically without the user having to select it manually. The user will still be able to select a different template afterwards.
templateTab.activeDefaultTooltip: This template is currently being used as default. Deactivating it will also remove it as default.
templateTab.systemTemplateTooltip: System templates can be used as default but will not be available for manual selection by a user.
templateTab.changedDefaultWarningMessage: Your current default is no longer active and has been de-selected.
templateTab.emptyStateBundleDescription: This feature is part of Microsoft 365 for Jira. You can switch to Microsoft 365 for Jira without losing any of your app data.
templateTab.emptyStateProjectTemplatesHeader: You haven't configured any project templates yet.

templateSingle.loginDescription: Please log in with your Microsoft 365 account to get a preview!
templateSingle.createSuccessMessage: The template has been created successfully.
templateSingle.updateSuccessMessage: The template has been saved successfully.
templateSingle.createIntroductionEmail:
Create a new email template that can be used when sending an email from Jira.
If you want to make the template available right away, select "Save & publish", otherwise choose "Save as draft" to activate it at a later point in time.
templateSingle.createIntroductionMeetings:
Create a new meeting template that can be used when creating a Outlook meeting from Jira.
If you want to make the template available right away, select "Save & publish", otherwise choose "Save as draft" to activate it at a later point in time.
templateSingle.createIntroductionChat:
Create a new chat that can be used when starting a new Teams chat from Jira.
If you want to make the template available right away, select "Save & publish", otherwise choose "Save as draft" to activate it at a later point in time.
templateSingle.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a descriptive text for this template
templateSingle.subjectTooltip: Handlebar syntax can be used, e.g. {{issue.key}}
templateSingle.titleTooltip: Handlebar syntax can be used, e.g. {{issue.key}}
templateSingle.emailSubjectTooltip: Handlebar syntax can be used, e.g. {{issue.key}}
templateSingle.meetingsTitleTooltip: Handlebar syntax can be used, e.g. {{issue.key}}
templateSingle.chatTitleTooltip: Handlebar syntax can be used, e.g. {{issue.key}}
templateSingle.invalidFormTooltip: Please fill out the required fields.
templateSingle.inactiveTooltip: Inactive templates will not be available for selection.
templateSingle.templateContentDescription:
The template content will be rendered within the context of the current issue.
You can preview the template by selecting an issue.
templateSingle.renderErrorMessage: The template contains a syntax error and could not be rendered. Please check the template and try again.
templateSingle.noIssueSelectedTooltip: Please select an issue first to preview the template.
templateSingle.requiresOAuth1aMessage: To show the template preview you need to login fist.

actions.browseUrlDescription: Adds a URL to the issue

defaultTemplatePicker.inheritedTooltip: The default template is inherited from global default template settings and must not be removed.
defaultTemplatePicker.templateNotFound: The template could not be found
defaultTemplatePicker.templateNotFoundDescription: Please remove the selected template or select another one.

email.detailDescription: Default template for emails. It will fill the subject with an issue's summary.

meetings.detailDescription: Default template for meetings. It will fill the title with an issue's key and summary. The body will contain a link to the issue.

chat.detailDescription: Default template for chats. It will fill the title with an issue's key and summary. The body will contain a link to the issue.
